name: Witch, Demons & Robot
description:
Story

The main character of our game is a student of the wizard Kaia, who constantly gets into trouble. And now, during the lesson about creating portals, she mistakenly created a portal to another dimension. In search of a way out, she stumbled upon hostile demons, but after finishing with them, she discovered that someone else was exploring this place, strange metal objects and a creature sprinkled with sand, what could it be?

Theme representation

Mix of the magic and robotic technologies. 

Music was AI generated by Ampermusic

How to play?

Your goal is to find a portal that will allow you to get out of this hostile place. Join forces with a robot to overcome enemies and all obstacles on your way.

Witch Abilities:

Lightning Strike - use it to kill demons or destroy obstacles. Also, an electric charge can strengthen your robot.

Wind Push - an ability that will help push annoying demons away

Frost Nova - allows you to slow down enemies, or create ice shield on the robot. It is also very useful for overcoming water barriers.

Your robot is able to interact with computer panels in order to open the gate and start the panel.

Cooperate with the robot to survive and get out of this hostile planet. Good luck!
